p: F. Grossi declares the following conflicts of interest: Consulting or Advisory Role for MSD Oncology, Bristol-Myers Squibb, AstraZeneca, Roche, Pfizer, Bayer. Speakers' Bureau: MSD Oncology, Bristol-Myers Squibb, AstraZeneca, Roche, Pierre Fabre, Amgen, Celgene, Eli Lilly, Pfizer. Research Funding: Bristol-Myers Squibb. Travel, Accomodations, Expenses: Bristol-Myers Squibb, MSD, Roche, AstraZeneca, Pierre Fabre, Celgene, Amgen, Eli Lilly, Novartis. All remaining authors have declared no conflicts of interest.
